title: Sneak E Squirrel
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A brewery with a small vegetarian (and lighter) section of the menu, of which the kale salad and the fried green tomatoes could be vegan; please inquire. Also, the kahuna burger could possibly be made vegan by omitting the cheese; please check if the aioli is vegan. Made-in-house hot sauces and rotating brews available. Also has a beer brewing equipment store as well as brewing classes.
